main event: A witness observed a bright, irregularly-shaped light in the sky over San Antonio, Texas, which moved slowly in a horizontal path for 3-5 minutes.
interesting points: The light was bright enough to be visible in the sky.
No other witnesses were observed in the immediate area.
The prolonged observation and other factors suggest the aerial phenomenon warrants further technical and intelligence analysis.
Similar aerial phenomena have been observed by both military and civilian personnel.
The observed light could be consistent with a meteor or similar natural phenomenon, but the report indicates there may be more to investigate.
